entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 09:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 38 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain near noon. Rain along the coast this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then south 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
